Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan scored 68 off 46 balls, putting on 85 for the first wicket with Babar Azam (31).
Pre-Game Insights: England captain Moeen Ali won the toss and elected to bowl.
Pakistan's players wore a special kit showing their names and numbers submerged in water to show solidarity with flood victims.
England's players wore black armbands as a tribute to Queen Elizabeth II.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Left-arm fast bowler Luke Wood made his T20I debut for England.
Batter Shan Masood played his first T20I for Pakistan.
